select /* TeamDao.getTeamByJoinCode */ team_idx as team_idx , team_nm as team_nm , team_desc as team_desc , date_format(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_date , join_code as join_code from team where join_code = #{joinCode}
